title: The Incredibles
description: A family of undercover superheroes tries to live quietly but must save the world.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A young robotics prodigy teams up with his inflatable robot and friends to save the city.

title: Rise of the Guardians
description: A group of legendary guardians including Santa, the Easter Bunny, and Jack Frost join forces to protect the world's children from an evil spirit.

title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
description: The Teen Titans set out to get their own superhero movie while fighting a villain.

title: Megamind
description: A supervillain becomes a hero after defeating his arch-nemesis.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his universe and meets others from multiverse.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A young Viking befriends a dragon and changes the way his village sees them.

title: The Lego Batman Movie
description: Batman faces a major threat while learning to work with others and not be alone.

title: Raya and the Last Dragon
description: A warrior sets out to find the last dragon and unite her divided land.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
description: Puss in Boots embarks on a journey to restore his nine lives by finding a magical wish.
